detail_desc: Lined swimsuit with a flounce at the top and one wide and one narrow shoulder strap.

Long, voluminous dress in an airy weave made from a Tencel™ lyocell blend with a V-neck, frill trim at the top and low-cut back. Narrow shoulder straps, narrow horizontal ties at the back and a gathered seam below the hips for added width.
Sunglasses with plastic frames and tinted, UV-protective lenses.
5-pocket slim-fit jeans in washed, superstretch denim for maximum mobility. High, adjustable, elasticated waist (in sizes 8-12Y), a zip fly and narrow hems.
Velour-covered hair elastic.
Long-sleeved shirt in checked cotton flannel with a collar, buttons down the front, a chest pocket with a button, and a gently rounded hem.
Shorts in a cotton weave with an elasticated, drawstring waist, fake fly, side pockets and a welt back pocket.
Headband knitted in a soft mohair and wool blend with a wrapover detail at the front.
Lace T-shirt bra with underwired, padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support. Adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Brazilian briefs in lace with a low waist, lined gusset and high cut at the back.
Boots with an ankle-height shaft, lacing at the front and loop at the back. Pile linings and insoles and chunky soles. Heel 3.5 cm.
Shorts in an airy viscose weave. High waist with wide, covered elastication at the back, pleats at the top, diagonal side pockets and wide legs.
Long-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with a round neckline, motif on the front and a rounded hem.

Set with a top and trousers in soft, printed sweatshirt fabric. Top with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Trousers with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.

Short-sleeved top in printed cotton jersey in a slightly A-line style with a press-stud on one shoulder, sewn-in turn-ups at the cuffs and slits in the sides. Slightly longer, rounded hem at the back.
Blouse in an airy, textured weave with wide cuffs with covered buttons.
Fine-knit trainer socks in various colours and designs.
Top in soft cotton jersey with lace at the top, dropped shoulders, short sleeves and a small embroidered detail at the hem.
Vest tops in soft, printed cotton jersey with a concealed press-stud on one shoulder.
Baby Exclusive. Set with a hat and mittens in jacquard-knit wool with pompoms. Hat with a jersey lining. Mittens with foldover cuffs. Size 0-6 M without thumbs.
Long-sleeved sports top in stretch jersey with a ventilating mesh back. Drawstring hood, stand-up collar and short slits in the sides. Rounded and slightly longer at the back.
Belt in imitation leather with a metal buckle. Width 2 cm.
Sports vest top in fast-drying functional fabric with a racer back that has a rubber print and ventilating hole pattern.
Long-sleeved bodysuit, a pair of trousers and accessory in soft organic cotton jersey. Bodysuit with press-studs at the crotch. Trousers with wide foldover ribbing at the waist.
Fancy dress costume in jersey with a zip down the front and a hood with an eye mask at the front.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a print motif.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a mid waist, medium coverage at the back and laser-cut, scalloped edges.
Long skirt in soft, heavily draping Tencel™ lyocell jersey. High waist with covered elastication. Lined.

STUDIO COLLECTION. Calf-length skirt in a pleated weave with a concealed zip in one side and a visible metal press-stud. The skirt is in a square cut creating asymmetric draping with longer sides and has a seam at the hem finishing with an airy mesh detail. Unlined.
Top in viscose jersey with a V-neck front and back and spaghetti shoulder straps. Jersey lining.
Socks in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops.
5-pocket trousers in washed, stretch twill with a regular waist, zip fly and skinny legs. Super skinny fit.

Knee-length cargo shorts in a stretch cotton weave with an elasticated drawstring waist and fake fly. Side pockets with decorative seams, flap back pockets with concealed press-studs and flap leg pockets with a pleat and concealed press-studs.

Soft, non-wired nursing bras in organic cotton jersey with a small lace trim at the top. Adjustable shoulder straps and padded, opening cups with space for nursing pads. Hook-and-eye fastening at the back. The cups are lined with recycled polyester.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a low, V-shaped waist and cutaway coverage at the back.
Top in a double layer of chiffon with narrow, double shoulder straps that cross at the back. Made partly from recycled polyester.
Jacket in woven fabric with a shawl collar, pockets in the side seams and 3/4-length gathered sleeves. No fasteners. Lined.
Briefs in stretch organic cotton jersey with flatlock seams for added comfort, an elasticated waist and lined front.
Trousers in a lightweight weave with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets, fake welt back pockets and straight legs. Jersey ribbing at the waist for optimum fit.
Short, V-neck dress in a viscose weave with narrow adjustable shoulder straps. The dress has a double layer of fabric at the top and narrow elastication at the waist. Unlined.
Straight-cut T-shirt in sturdier pima cotton jersey with a ribbed round neckline and dropped shoulders. Slightly wider fit.
Joggers in lightweight cotton twill with elastication and a decorative button at the waist, fake front pockets, a fake welt pocket at the back, and ribbed hems.
Short-sleeved cotton jersey top in a relaxed fit with a slightly wider neckline and a rounded hem.
Patterned sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with short raglan sleeves.
Ankle-length cotton twill trousers in a relaxed fit. Regular waist with wide, elasticated ribbing and a drawstring, diagonal side pockets and a back pocket. Wide, straight legs with flap leg pockets.
Calf-length dress in an airy cotton weave with a smocked bodice and narrow shoulder straps with decorative bows at the top. Gathered tier to create volume and movement in the skirt. Unlined.

CONSCIOUS EXCLUSIVE. Jacquard-weave top in an airy Tencel™ lyocell and silk blend. V-neck with gathered seams at the front and narrow ties at the back of the neck, and a concealed zip in the side. Dropped shoulders and long puff sleeves with pleats and elasticated cuffs.
T-shirt in lightweight jersey with a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.

Short, A-line dress in a pleated weave made partly from recycled polyester. Small frilled collar, an opening at the back with a covered button at the back of the neck and long sleeves with concealed elastication and a frill trim at the cuffs. Lined in fabric made partly from recycled polyester.
High-waisted trousers in a sturdy, patterned jacquard weave with a zip fly and button and slim, straight legs with creases.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with a print motif, jersey-lined hood with a wrapover front, long sleeves with ribbed cuffs and wide ribbing at the hem. Soft brushed inside.
Long-sleeved nightshirt in a soft cotton weave with buttons down the front, a chest pocket and a rounded hem.
Swim shorts in a printed weave with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and a welt back pocket with a hook and loop fastener. Soft mesh inner shorts.

Short dress in a patterned crêpe weave with a V-neck at the back and horizontal strap with a button at the back of the neck. 3/4-length sleeves with a drawstring and ties at the cuffs, and a gently bell-shaped skirt with a seam and frill at the hem. Unlined.
Blouse in woven fabric with a V-neck, long sleeves and wide cuffs with a covered button.

LIMITED EDITION. Wide dress in an airy viscose weave with a V-neck with decorative stitching at the top and short sleeves with a wide flounce at the ends. Seam with a decorative frill at the waist and a wide, gathered, softly draping skirt. Unlined.
Shorts in a cotton weave with covered elastication and a contrasting colour drawstring at the waist. Side pockets, flap leg pockets and fake back pockets with a flap.
Dress in cotton piqué with a collar, button placket and small embroidery detail at the top. Short puff sleeves and a bell-shaped skirt.

Short dress in an airy weave with pin-tucks at the top and an opening with a button at the back of the neck. Seam at the waist, bell-shaped skirt, and lace details at the cuffs and hem. Jersey inner dress.
Flip-flops with rubber straps and fluted rubber soles.
Airy top with a small frilled collar and an opening with a button at the back of the neck. Short sleeves with a flounce at the ends, and a seam at the hem with a wide flounce on one side.
Sleeveless top in soft jersey containing some linen with a small frill trim around the armholes.
Wide, cropped jersey T-shirt with a print motif on the front.
Knee-length cargo shorts in cotton twill with an elasticated waist, zip fly, side pockets, and flap leg and back pockets with a concealed hook and loop fastening.
Loafers in imitation leather with a seam and decorative metal snaffle trim at the front. Satin linings made from recycled polyester, imitation leather insoles, and smooth soles. Heel 2.2 cm.
Suede loafers with a decorative seam at the front and soft heel caps so they can be worn as slip-ons. Leather linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles. Heel approx. 1.5 cm.
Leggings in soft, patterned organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with wide ribbing to hold in and shape the waist. Concealed mesh key pocket in the waistband.
Fully lined, waist-high bikini bottoms with a high cut at the back.
Top in lightweight cotton sweatshirt fabric in a relaxed fit with long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in sturdy cotton denim. Regular waist with covered elastication at the back, a zip fly and button, and wide, tapered legs.
Round metal earrings. Length 4 cm.
Jumper in a soft knit. Relaxed fit with long, raglan balloon sleeves, ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem, and slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Pull-on trousers in patterned cotton twill with wide elastication at the waist, side pockets and tapered legs with decorative seams at the knees and elasticated hems. Fleece lining.
Jumper in a soft, fine knit with a round neckline and long dolman sleeves.
Sarong in an airy weave. Size 140x150 cm.
Short dress in airy, patterned crinkled fabric with a square neckline, long sleeves with gathers at the shoulders, and a smocked seam at the waist. Jersey lining.
Short, 5-pocket denim skirt with a high waist, zip fly and button, frayed hem and short slits in the sides. Longer at the back.

Twill trousers with a regular waist that is elasticated at the back, pleats at the top, side pockets and a fake welt back pocket. Zip fly and button, and straight legs with contrasting colour panels down the sides.

Set with a pair of joggers and a hoodie in lightweight sweatshirt fabric and a matching T-shirt in cotton jersey. Joggers with an elasticated, drawstring waist, discreet side pockets and ribbed hems. Hoodie with a jersey-lined hood, kangaroo pocket, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. T-shirt with a narrow, ribbed trim around the neckline. The cotton content of the set is organic.
